regen.absent_element: warning or notification for unsuccessful data archiving
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user in case of failed data archiving operation.
The system shall provide a mechanism to permanently delete archived data when no longer needed.

regen.absent_element: warning or notification for unsuccessful data archiving
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user if data archiving is unsuccessful.

label: The user shall be able to restore the archived data.
absence: action of restoring the archived data
